text:
Question from <@U7KKA4QQM> (repost) - "Hey Luke for the marketplace modules I have a question from Will one of my developers, thought maybe you knew?  Do we have to support older then IE11? Because that limits our options on what we can do, so it would be good to know what browsers they would want supported."

> I'm checking with the marketplace team... but in the mean time does anyone know what versions of IE need to be supported?

Per the Marketplace Requirements there actually isn't requirements to support any specific browsers that I can see.
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/resources/what-are-the-submission-requirements-for-the-template-marketplace>

it does say though:
>>>Providers must support their own work if there are issues with any of the code.
So if there is an issue with a customer using your code and it needs to be for IE 10, i am guessing that would mean you would have to work with them to support it
HS really needs to take a page from Envato and add in a "Compatible Browsers" meta box

Yeah, but how many agencies actually follow and how much does HubSpot enforce the requirements? I know a lot that are not in compliance with this one: 
"1.4  Providers may offer up to five free templates."

lol
lol yea, the requirements are pretty fast and loose
I slacked the Marketplace team and they are going to get a 100% answer by Monday. I'll repost
thanks for posting responses guys  -I'll follow up with what I hear back
